articles.title: Lionel Messi says he will keep on playing for Argentina beyond Copa America final - The Associated Press
articles.description: Lionel Messi plans to keep playing for Argentina beyond Sunday’s Copa America final. Speaking after Canada's 2-0 win over Canada, Messi says: “I intend to continue” and adds ”I intend to keep living day by day without thinking about what will come in the futu…
articles.content:
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. (AP) Lionel Messi plans to keep playing for Argentina beyond Sundays Copa America final.
As Ive said before, I intend to continue, he said Tuesday night after Argentinas 2-0 wi… [+2307 chars]
